$schema.description: Optional JSON Schema URL for editor validation.

template_path.description: Path to the template file. Can be absolute, relative to the config, or use ~ / env vars.

overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite existing destination files.

backup.description: Whether to create a backup before overwriting.

agent.description: Agent identifier (used for {{AGENT_NAME}} default unless overridden).

path.description: Destination file path. Can be absolute, relative to the config, or use ~ / env vars.

enabled.description: Whether this target is enabled (defaults to true).

variables.description: Variables available to the template for this target (overrides built-ins).
